News.headline: Match Preview: Dagenham and Redbridge v Braintree Town
News.page_title: Match Preview: Dagenham and Redbridge v Braintree Town
News.URL_keywords: Match Preview: Dagenham and Redbridge v Braintree Town
News.short_description: A preview of the Daggers Vanarama National League Essex derby home match against Braintree Town on the 2nd January
News.description:
The Daggers will look to overturn recent home form, with the Daggers not winning at home in their last five fixtures. 

The Daggers opponents Braintree currently sit in eighteenth place, three places above the relegation zone. The Iron are unbeaten in their last five league matches.

Previous 5 Results

Daggers
Braintree 3-2 Daggers
Daggers 4-4 Solihull Moors
Daggers 1-2 Worthing
Dover 1-2 Daggers
Daggers 0-1 Torquay United

Braintree Town
Braintree 3-2 Daggers
Boreham Wood 0-1 Braintree
Gateshead 1-1 Braintree
Braintree 2-0 Torquay
Millwall 5-2 Braintree (Emirates FA Cup)

Team News
The Daggers are still without a number of players for their Essex derby match. Okenabirhie, Robson, Williams, Howell, Pennell and Robinson are all set to miss out.

Previous Meetings
This will be the second meeting between the two teams in the league after our away tie at Braintree Town on Boxing Day.

Fixtures
There is a full list of Vanarama National League fixtures this weekend. All 3:00pm KO’s unless stated.

Saturday 31st December:
Boreham Wood v Eastleigh (1:00pm KO)
Gateshead v Barrow

Sunday 1st January:
Woking v Aldershot Town
Chester v Solihull Moors
Forest Green Rovers v Torquay United
Lincoln City v Guiseley
Macclesfield Town v Tranmere Rovers
Southport v Wrexham
Sutton United v Bromley
York City v North Ferriby United
Maidstone United v Dover Athletic (6:00pm KO)

Monday 2nd January:
Dagenham and Redbridge v Braintree Town (7:45pm KO)

Tickets
Ticket information for the game can be found here.

Social Media & Online
Follow the Daggers on Twitter for live updates throughout the match (@Dag_RedFC). There will also be updates on our Facebook page (OfficialDaggers). After the match there will be a match report on the website
